fields.label: Page Meta Title
fields.name: page_meta_title
fields.instructions: Displays in the the tabs of browsers and on most search results pages. Recommended max length of 60 characters. If left blank, the post title is used instead.

fields.label: Page Meta Description
fields.name: page_meta_description
fields.instructions: Displays on most search engine results pages. Recommended max length of 160 characters. If left blank, a description is made from the content of the page or the default social description.

fields.label: Page Meta Image
fields.name: page_meta_image
fields.instructions: Enter an image for when content is shared on social networks. If left blank, an image will be grabbed from the page or the default social image will be used is made from the content of the page or the default social description. Use images that are at least 1200 x 630 pixels for the best display on high resolution devices. At the minimum, you should use images that are 600 x 315 pixels to display link page posts with larger images. Images can be up to 8MB in size.
